data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,426,405 lost people in  Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Uzbek, Northern people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Ulaanbaatar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 12,536 believers living in the state of Ulaanbaatar. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia has a population of 1,452,000.

We estimate Ulaanbaatar has 12,536 people who might know Jesus, 13,059 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,426,405 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 115 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ulaanbaatar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
